title: Early-career trans researchers reconsider their futures amid lost funding and fear
description: The chaos created by the freezing and termination of billions of dollars of research grants has left trans academics especially vulnerable.
content: The chaos created by the freezing and termination of billions of dollars of research grants has left trans academics especially vulnerable.
